p.d: Milly-la-Foret peppermint and honey from the Gâtinais In the Gâtinais regional park, in Essonne, Alain Bosc Bierne is the last surviving grower of peppermint in Milly-la-Foret. Thierry and Camille Sergent are also enthusiastic champions of local flavours making the famous Gâtinais honey that they invite visitors to discover. On the menu: melon and honey vinaigrette. Presented by: Guy Martin.
